titles.title: Frontier Health Care Access Act of 2003
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide greater access for residents of frontier areas to health care services provided by community health centers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 12/8/2003--Introduced. Frontier Health Care Access Act of 2003 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to include residents of frontier areas (as defined by this Act) within the population groups making a servicing health facility eligible for "health center" grants and loans.
